otherNightReminder: Ask them to choose a player to die and mark that player with the 'Dead' Reminder. Put them to sleep. If no one is holding a Potion of Terror. Wake up a living player and tell them that they received a Potion of Terror.
name: Megalomaniac
ability: Each night*, choose a player; they die. Then, if no player is holding a Potion of Terror, a player receives a Potion of Terror. [+2 Potions of Terror]
flavor: I believe you find life such a problem because you think there are the good people and the bad people. You're wrong, of course. There are, always and only, the bad people, but some of them are on opposite sides.
